name: ByteCountFormatter.Units
desc: Specifies the units appropriate for the formatter to display. Specifying any units explicitly causes just those units to be used in showing the number.

items.name: static var useBytes: ByteCountFormatter.Units
items.desc: Displays bytes in the formatter content.

items.name: static var useKB: ByteCountFormatter.Units
items.desc: Displays kilobytes in the formatter content.

items.name: static var useMB: ByteCountFormatter.Units
items.desc: Displays megabytes in the formatter content.

items.name: static var useGB: ByteCountFormatter.Units
items.desc: Displays gigabytes in the formatter content.

items.name: static var useTB: ByteCountFormatter.Units
items.desc: Displays terabytes in the formatter content.

items.name: static var usePB: ByteCountFormatter.Units
items.desc: Displays petabyte in the formatter content.

items.name: static var useEB: ByteCountFormatter.Units
items.desc: Displays exabytes in the formatter content.

items.name: static var useZB: ByteCountFormatter.Units
items.desc: Displays zettabytes in the formatter content.

items.name: static var useYBOrHigher: ByteCountFormatter.Units
items.desc: Displays yottabytes in the formatter content.

items.name: static var useAll: ByteCountFormatter.Units
items.desc: Can use any unit in the formatter content.
